Module: Datepick-ext

Extensions to the Datepick plugin.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 42

Members

(inner) themeRollerRenderer

ThemeRoller template for generating a datepicker. Use it with the renderer option.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 58
Example
renderer: $.datepick.themeRollerRenderer

(inner) themeRollerWeekOfYearRenderer

ThemeRoller template for generating a datepicker showing week of year. Use it with the renderer option.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 63
Example
renderer: $.datepick.themeRollerWeekOfYearRenderer

(inner) weekOfYearRenderer

Template for generating a datepicker showing week of year. Use it with the renderer option.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 49
Example

Methods

(inner) changeFirstDay(picker, inst)

Change the first day of the week by clicking on the day header. Use it with the onShow option.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
picker jQuery The completed datepicker division.
inst object The current instance settings.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 82
Example

(inner) highlightWeek(picker, inst)

Highlight the entire week when hovering over it. Use it with the onShow option.

Name Type Description
picker jQuery The completed datepicker division.
inst object The current instance settings.

Example

(inner) hoverCallback(onHover)

Add a callback when hovering over dates. Use it with the onShow option.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
onHover DatepickOnHover The callback when hovering, it receives the current date and a flag indicating selectability as parameters on entry, and no parameters on exit, this refers to the target input or division.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 117
Example
onShow: $.datepick.hoverCallback(handleHover)

(inner) noWeekends(date) → {object}

Don't allow weekends to be selected. Use it with the onDate option.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
date Date The current date.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 73
Returns:
Information about this date.
Type
object
Example
onDate: $.datepick.noWeekends

(inner) selectMonth(picker, inst)

Select an entire month when clicking on the week header. Use it with the onShow option. Use in conjunction with weekOfYearRenderer or themeRollerWeekOfYearRenderer.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
picker jQuery The completed datepicker division.
inst object The current instance settings.
Source:
  • jquery.datepick.ext.js, line 258
Example
onShow: $.datepick.selectMonth

(inner) selectWeek(picker, inst)

Select an entire week when clicking on a week number. Use it with the onShow option. Use in conjunction with weekOfYearRenderer or themeRollerWeekOfYearRenderer.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
picker jQuery The completed datepicker division.
inst object The current instance settings.
